Anyway the "TOED.REG. file" should have been there...When you downloaded it ,did you have a lot of "harsch faults???" Maybe it got corrupted in the long run..
Agaiea PshyX drivers are needed as well...I dont need to tell you that because i know that you got knowledge far more than many here..

Ok lets try this "iamreadyforanything2009"
Erase it and make a good clean up at your registry..Mover the folder to  C: drive/ games,even if you are seeding...You can always move it back later...Sometimes it aint working because you have to many search words when it launches...C:/games/desktop/my ??/Jericho...Now try to extract again..
If you are not getting past throught it then you have to download it again if you cant handle the piece by piece replacing.. This is a mystery so far but we will figured it out no worries there mate..
I dont have the game myself. In worst scenario i will download it so i can have a look on it..
